Form fields¶

Various form fields in the form. This are essentially answer types.

class form_builder.fields.AiImageDirectives(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Defines AI(Image analysis) directives to applied on an photo answer.

Note

Only applicable for answer types of type photo.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class form_builder.fields.AiTextDirectives(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Defines AI(text analysis) directives to applied on an answer.

Note

Only applicable on answer type of type text.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class form_builder.fields.BasicFormField(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

An abstract field that defines basic definition of a field in a form. Inherit this class to create any field.

Note

All form fields inherit this fields that is, every form field is type of BasicFirmField.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

get_translation_ids()¶

Get all translations used in this field.

Returns:List<languages.model.Translation>

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

to_json()¶

Get json form for this field.

Returns:JSON

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

translation¶

Returns translation for question text.

Returns:languages.models.Translation instance.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

validate_value(value)¶

Validate value as the answer for question of this form field. Throws form_builder.form_exceptions.FieldValueError.

Parameters:value – Value

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class form_builder.fields.BinaryFormField(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Defines a binary choice field with only 2 options, one for true and other for false.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class form_builder.fields.Choice(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Define a simple choice (with value & text) for a multiple choice field.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class form_builder.fields.ChoiceOrder¶

Enum class for types of ordering in choice fields.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class form_builder.fields.DataType¶

Enum class for data types used in the form.

Warning

Some of these static variables have been used in ‘MCQ_Types’ which have been referenced using values instead of variable. Please be careful will making any amendments.

usage:

  • form_builder/templates/themes/<theme_name>/fields/choice_other.html

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

static get_python_class(type)¶

Returns a python data type for a form data type.

Parameters:type – Form type as in form_builder.fields.DataType
Returns:Python type

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class form_builder.fields.DateFormField(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Defines a date field. Date is stored as YYYY-MM-DD.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class form_builder.fields.DateTimeFormField(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Defines a datetime form field that stores date as well as time together.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class form_builder.fields.DecimalFormField(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Defines a field for entering a decimal as well as integer values. All integer values will be converted to decimal.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

get_max_length()¶

Return maximum input length of this field, which is integer count + 1 + decimal count :return:

get_min_value()¶

Returns minimum possible value this field can have depending upon ‘allow_negative’ & ‘min_value’ :return:

class form_builder.fields.EmailFormField(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Defines an email form field.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class form_builder.fields.MCMSFormField(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Defines a ‘Multiple Choice Multiple Select’ field that will show multiple choices from which n-number of choices can be selected as answer.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class form_builder.fields.MCQ_Types¶

Enum class for data types allowed for MCQ questions. These are subset of form_builder.fields.DataType.

Warning

Please read form_builder.fields.DataType warning before making any changes.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class form_builder.fields.MCSSFormField(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Defines a ‘Multiple Choice Single Select’ field that will show multiple choices from which only one choice can be selected as answer.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class form_builder.fields.NumberFormField(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Defines a numeric field for entering a integer values only.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

get_min_value()¶

Returns minimum possible value this field can have depending upon ‘allow_negative’ & ‘min_value’

Returns:Minimuim value

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class form_builder.fields.OtherOptionType¶

Enum class for types of questions asked when other option is selected for a MCQ question.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class form_builder.fields.PasswordFormField(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Defines a password form field.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class form_builder.fields.RatingFormField(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Defines a rating field that allows user to rate on a scale of 1 to ‘max-score’. Rating is of type integer.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class form_builder.fields.TextAreaFormField(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Defines a multi-line text field that can hold a reasonable number of characters.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class form_builder.fields.TextFormField(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Defines a single-line text field.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

class form_builder.fields.TimeFormField(_obj=None, **kwargs)¶

Defines a time field. Time is stored as HH:MM:SS.

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

form_builder.fields.create_field_obj(field_dict)¶

Converts a field dictionary into a corresponding field object.

Parameters:condition_dict – dict
Returns:Field Object

Authors: Gagandeep Singh
